thread.title: Russia says shelling of its embassy in Damascus act of terrorism - Region - World
thread.title_full: Russia says shelling of its embassy in Damascus act of terrorism - Region - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Russia says shelling of its embassy in Damascus act of terrorism - Region - World
text:
Related Syria troops advance under Russian air cover Saudis tell Russia: Syria action will have "dangerous consequences": Source 'Fiercest clashes' as Syria regime advances with Russian support Russian air force struck 53 targets in Syria in last 24 hours: Military Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Tuesday Moscow considered the shelling of its embassy in Damascus as a terrorist act, RIA news agency reported on Tuesday.
"This is an obvious act of terrorism, probably aimed at intimidating supporters of the fight against terrorism," Lavrov was Quote: d as saying ahead of talks with the United Nations' special envoy for Syria, Staffan de Mistura, on Tuesday, .
Two shells were fired at the Russian embassy in Damascus on Tuesday during a demonstration in support of Moscow although there were no immediate reports of casualties or damage to the building.
Lavrov also said Russia was supporting De Mistura's efforts to ensure a political settlement to the Syria crisis and was disappointed by U.S. reluctance to coordinate the efforts of all sides involved in fighting terrorism in Syria, RIA reported.
